title: Process a Transhipment Container
description: A container is discharged from one vessel and will be loaded onto another vessel at the same terminal without leaving the port.

tasks.description: The TOS identifies a container on a discharge list as 'Transhipment' based on its documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically flags the container as a transhipment move.

tasks.description: Assign the container to a specific transhipment block in the yard to keep it separate from local imports.
tasks.expected_outcome: The yard plan assigns the container to a location in the transhipment zone.

tasks.description: Ensure the container is not made available for truck pickup and is automatically added to the load list for the connecting vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system correctly manages the container's status, preventing an erroneous gate move and ensuring it's planned for the next vessel.
